content: learn how to make crochet a coffee mug keychain amigurumi this easy crochet coffee mug pattern tutorial teaches you how to crochet a coffee mug with a video or written pattern it even includes a free pdf why did the coffee file a police report because it was mugged pattern available here with a full length video tutorial https //www clubcrochet com/coffee **the materials ** the yarn worsted weight main color brown center size g6/4 00mm hook stuffing needle gauge 5 rnds and 4 sts per 1 finished piece is about 1 tall worked in the round **the stitches ** chain chain stitch st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease/increase decrease/increase flo front loops only blo back loops only
